SwissBorg (https://swissborg.com/en/) | Lausanne, SWITZERLAND | Full-Time | ONSITE

SwissBorg is a fintech company building the new era of wealth management on the blockchain. Developed by a team of financial experts, we are decentralized to the world with teams in Toronto, Tokyo and London and operate as a meritocracy.

  We are looking for a FINANCIAL SCALA BACK-END ENGINEER.
Essentially, you would be building a robust and scalable infrastructure capable of handling digital cash and crypto-currency transactions for smartphone users all around the world.

Work involves financial algorithms so a Master's or PhD is preferred.

You can apply on our website or contact me directly at christopher@swissborg.com
